title: Multi-head Spatial-Spectral Mamba for Hyperspectral Image Classification
abstract: arXiv:2408.01224v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Spatial-Spectral Mamba (SSM) improves computational efficiency and captures long-range dependencies, addressing Transformer limitations. However, traditional Mamba models overlook rich spectral information in HSIs and struggle with high dimensionality and sequential data. To address these issues, we propose the SSM with multi-head self-attention and token enhancement (MHSSMamba). This model integrates spectral and spatial information by enhancing spectral tokens and using multi-head attention to capture complex relationships between spectral bands and spatial locations. It also manages long-range dependencies and the sequential nature of HSI data, preserving contextual information across spectral bands. MHSSMamba achieved remarkable classification accuracies of 97.62\% on Pavia University, 96.92\% on the University of Houston, 96.85\% on Salinas, and 99.49\% on Wuhan-longKou datasets.

translated_title: 多头空间- spectral Mamba 用于 hyperspectral 图像分类
translated_abstract: 摘要类型：新版 arXiv: 2408.01224v1 宣布内容： 摘要 Spatial-Spectral Mamba (SSM) 改进了计算效率并捕获了长距离依赖，解决了Transformer的局限性。然而，传统Mamba模型忽略了HSI中丰富的光谱信息，并且在处理高维度和序列数据时遇到了困难。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了带有多头自注意力和标记增强的SSM（MHSSMamba）。该模型通过增强光谱标记和使用多头注意来捕捉光谱条带和空间位置之间的复杂关系，集成光谱和空间信息。它还管理了HSI数据的长距离依赖性和序列本质，保留了光谱条带之间的重要上下文信息。MHSSMamba在Pavia University、University of Houston、Salinas和Wuhan-longKou数据集上的分类准确率分别为97.62%、96.92%、96.85%和99.49%。
tldr: 该论文提出了一种名为MHSSMamba的新模型，该模型结合了空间和时间光谱信息，通过增强光谱标记和多头注意来捕捉复杂关系，并在多个HSI数据集上实现了最高的分类准确率。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a novel model called MHSSMamba, which integrates spatial-spectral information by enhancing spectral tokens and using multi-head attention to capture complex relationships, achieving the highest classification accuracy on multiple hyperspectral image datasets.
